description: Return a description of custom domain names that are associated with an App Runner service.

parameters.name: ServiceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the App Runner service that you want associated custom domain names to be described for.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: A token from a previous result page. It's used for a paginated request. The request retrieves the next result page. All other parameter values must be identical to the ones that are specified in the initial request. If you don't specify NextToken, the request retrieves the first result page.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results that each response (result page) can include. It's used for a paginated request. If you don't specify MaxResults, the request retrieves all available results in a single response.

nested_items.name: DNSTarget
nested_items.description: The App Runner subdomain of the App Runner service. The associated custom domain names are mapped to this target name.

nested_items.name: ServiceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the App Runner service whose associated custom domain names you want to describe.

nested_items.name: CustomDomains
nested_items.description: A list of descriptions of custom domain names that are associated with the service. In a paginated request, the request returns up to MaxResults records per call.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: An associated custom domain endpoint. It can be a root domain (for example, example.com), a subdomain (for example, login.example.com or admin.login.example.com), or a wildcard (for example, *.example.com).

nested_items.name: EnableWWWSubdomain
nested_items.description: When true, the subdomain www.DomainName is associated with the App Runner service in addition to the base domain.

nested_items.name: CertificateValidationRecords
nested_items.description: A list of certificate CNAME records that's used for this domain name.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current state of the certificate CNAME record validation. It should change to SUCCESS after App Runner completes validation with your DNS.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current state of the domain name association.

nested_items.name: VpcDNSTargets
nested_items.description: DNS Target records for the custom domains of this Amazon VPC.

nested_items.name: VpcIngressConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC Ingress Connection that is associated with your service.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon VPC that is associated with the custom domain name of the target DNS.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The domain name of your target DNS that is associated with the Amazon VPC.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token that you can pass in a subsequent request to get the next result page. It's returned in a paginated request.
